title: St. Paul's School (New Hampshire)
summary: St. Paul's School (also known as St. Paul's or SPS) is a highly selective college-preparatory, coeducational boarding school in Concord, New Hampshire, affiliated with the Episcopal Church. It is often regarded as one of the most elite boarding schools in the United States.[12][13][14][15][16][17] The school's 2,000-acre (8.1Â km2), or 3.125 square mile, campus currently serves 539 students, who come from 40 states and 18 countries.[18]
